DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : AIRLINES
DOC.TEXT: USAir Pilots Say Agreement Likely by Year-End : At a forum to build support for a proposed employee-aided restructuring plan among pilots and other employees , union leaders said criticism from the company and other unions was posturing as a negotiating tactic . Pilots union leaders also said recent USAir criticisms of the plan did not constitute rejection . The union has proposed a restructuring that would swap $ 2.5 billion in_labor cuts for 25 % of USAir ' s common shares , $ 700 million in preferred shares and changes in the company ' s board to allow union representation .
